attributes.action: increase bus services and make them more available to people.
attributes.additional_details: I think that the bus services in the north east of England could be doing more to make transport more accessible because many people have to walk up to a mile before they can get on any means of transport.
attributes.background: I would like the government to increase bus services in the north east as the situation is quite bad at the moment and make them available to more people who don't live near any other means of transport.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
